A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: During my viewing of the last Jedi I kept looking for reasons this movie was good. I found none\, what was built in The Force Awakens was torn down in this lackluster sequel. I could not invest in any of the characters whatsoever\, poor writing\, poor directing and poor editing. At the very least I thought I would be entertained and have a fun time. I did not and I actually fear for the future of Star Wars. If the franchise slows down or dies it will be because of The Last Jedi.
